title: Energy Systems Analy&Dgn
description: Integrated concepts, laws, and methodologies from thermal sciences are used to analyze, model, and design energy systems and to predict system performance for fixed designs.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (AE 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and ME 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and ME 3345 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
